attributes.action: Use Predicted Grades to Determine the Future of Year 10’s
attributes.additional_details: This is the best scenario possible as it gives teachers a chance to restart when students and staff return to school (which could still be a long time in the future) and it gives Year 10 students clarity and a fresh burst of energy to get the best grade possible ready for the world of work-who are desperately waiting for new employees.
attributes.background: We want predicted grades to determine the future of next years Year 11’s (current Year 10’s). This will put students minds at ease and they can then work stress free. The work done in lockdown wouldn’t go to waste and go towards a final predicted grade at the end of next year.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

Work with regulators and exam providers to clarify exam arrangements for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570
